languages.text: Обновленные орудия ударяют по станции, не оставляя адептам Машинного культа и шанса на выживание. Команда в смятении — с одной стороны, офицеры ликуют и восхваляют новые орудия, что помогут судну Вольного Торговца в дальнейших плаваниях. С другой — стоила ли демонстрация силы жизней верных подданных Империума?

traits.locale_text: Обновленные орудия ударяют по станции, не оставляя адептам машинного культа и шанса на выживание. Команда в смятении — с одной стороны, офицеры ликуют и восхваляют новые орудия, что помогут вам в дальнейших плаваниях. С другой — стоила ли демонстрация силы жизней верных подданных Империума?

languages.text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?
languages.original_text: Обновленные орудия ударяют по станции, не оставляя адептам Машинного культа и шанса на выживание. Команда в смятении — с одной стороны, офицеры ликуют и восхваляют новые орудия, что помогут судну Вольного Торговца в дальнейших плаваниях. С другой — стоила ли демонстрация силы жизней верных подданных Империума?

traits.locale_text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in disarray. On the other hand, the jubilant officers are praising the new cannons that are going to help you on your further journeys. On the other hand, was the show of force really worth the lives of those faithful servants of the Imperium?

On the other hand, the jubilant officers are praising the new cannons that are going to help you on your further journeys. On the other hand, was the show of force really worth the lives of those faithful servants of the Imperium?

The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in disarray. On the other hand, the jubilant officers are praising these new weapons that are going to help you on your further journeys. On the other hand, was this show of force really worth the lives of those faithful servants of the Imperium?

The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. Your voidship's crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help you on your future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. Your voidship's crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help you on your future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

languages.text: 升级过的巨炮朝星站开了火，机械修会的信徒们没有任何生还的可能。船员们对这种行为看法不一。军官们欢呼雀跃赞美着新武器，说这样的武器肯定会对未来的旅途有所帮助。但其他人却在质疑——仅仅是为了展示武力，真的值得让帝国那些忠实的仆人丧命吗？
languages.original_text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

traits.locale_text: 升级过的巨炮朝星站开了火，机械修会的信徒们没有任何生还的可能。船员们对这种行为看法不一。军官们欢呼雀跃赞美着新武器，说这样的武器肯定会对未来的旅途有所帮助。但其他人却在质疑——仅仅是为了展示武力，真的值得让帝国那些忠实的仆人丧命吗？

languages.text: Los cañones mejorados impactan contra la estación, y los adeptos del Culto Máquina no tienen posibilidad alguna de sobrevivir. La tripulación está confusa: aunque hay oficiales celebrando la potencia de las nuevas armas, que sin duda serán útiles en los próximos viajes de la nave del vacío, otros se preguntan si realmente merecía la pena hacer esta demostración de fuerza contra sirvientes fieles del Imperium.
languages.original_text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

traits.locale_text: Los cañones mejorados impactan contra la estación, y los adeptos del Culto Máquina no tienen posibilidad alguna de sobrevivir. La tripulación de tu nave del vacío está confusa: aunque hay oficiales celebrando la potencia de las nuevas armas, que sin duda serán útiles en vuestros próximos viajes, otros se preguntan si realmente merecía la pena hacer esta demostración de fuerza contra sirvientes fieles del Imperium.

languages.text: アップグレードされたキャノンがステーションを襲い、機械教団の信奉者たちは生き残れる見込みがなく、クルーは混乱していた。歓喜に沸く士官らは新しい武器が今後のヴォイドシップでの旅に必ず役立つと賞賛しているが、他の士官はこの力の誇示が本当に帝国の忠実な使用人の命に値するのかと問いかけている。
languages.original_text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

traits.locale_text: アップグレードされたキャノンがステーションを襲い、機械教団の信奉者たちは生き残れる見込みがない。ヴォイドシップのクルーは混乱していた。歓喜に沸く士官らは新しい武器が今後の旅に必ず役立つと賞賛しているが、他の士官はこの力の誇示が本当に帝国の忠実な使用人の命に値するのかと問いかけている。

languages.text: Die verbesserten Kanonen treffen die Station und lassen den Adepten des Maschinenkults keine Überlebenschance. Die Crew ist in Aufruhr ... während jubelnde Offiziere die neuen Waffen preisen, die dem Raumschiff auf zukünftigen Reisen gewiss eine große Hilfe sein werden, fragen andere, ob diese Machtdemonstration wirklich die Leben treuer Diener des Imperiums wert war.
languages.original_text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

traits.locale_text: Die verbesserten Kanonen treffen die Station und lassen den Adepten des Maschinenkults keine Überlebenschance. Die Crew ist in Aufruhr ... während jubelnde Offiziere die neuen Waffen preisen, die dem Raumschiff auf zukünftigen Reisen gewiss eine große Hilfe sein werden, fragen andere, ob diese Machtdemonstration wirklich die Leben treuer Diener des Imperiums wert war.

Die verbesserten Kanonen treffen die Station und lassen den Adepten des Maschinenkults keine Überlebenschance. Die Crew deines Raumschiffs ist in heller Aufruhr — während jubelnde Offiziere die neuen Waffen preisen, die euch auf zukünftigen Reisen gewiss eine große Hilfe sein werden, fragen andere, ob diese Machtdemonstration wirklich die Leben treuer Diener des Imperiums wert war.

languages.text: Les canons améliorés tirent sur la station, ôtant toute chance de survie aux adeptes du culte de la machine. L'équipage du croiseur stellaire est en effervescence : pendant que des officiers réjouis louent les vertus des nouvelles armes, qui seront certainement utiles lors des futurs voyages, d'autres se demandent si cette démonstration de force nécessitait vraiment de prendre la vie de loyaux serviteurs de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?

traits.locale_text: Les canons améliorés tirent sur la station, ôtant toute chance de survie aux adeptes du culte des machines. L'équipage de votre croiseur stellaire est en effervescence : pendant que des officiers réjouis louent les vertus des nouvelles armes, qui vous seront certainement utiles lors de vos voyages, d'autres se demandent si cette démonstration de force nécessitait vraiment de prendre la vie de loyaux serviteurs de l'Imperium.

languages.text: Geliştirilmiş toplar, istasyonu vuruyor ve Makine Tarikatı'nın uzmanlarına hayatta kalma şansı bırakmıyor. Mürettebat arasında bir kargaşa patlak veriyor. Coşkulu subaylar, uçsuz gemisinin gelecekteki yolculuklarında büyük fayda sağlayacak bu yeni silahları överken kimileri, bu güç gösterisinin İmparatorluk'un sadık hizmetkârlarının hayatlarını yitirmesine gerçekten değip değmediğini sorguluyor.
languages.original_text: The upgraded cannons strike the station, leaving the Machine Cult adepts with no chance of survival. The crew is in turmoil — while jubilant officers are praising the new weapons, which will surely help the voidship on its future travels, others are asking if this show of force was really worth the lives of faithful servants of the Imperium?
